Description: Two non-joining rim sherds of Laconian, probably black-figured, pottery kylix; dull cream slip; interior: narrow black band at lip above frieze of slim lotus buds between pairs of bands; exterior: wide black band at rim (on which inscription is incised); below, net pattern frieze between sets of narrow bands.
Curator's comments: This sherds have been attributed to the Arkesilas Painter (Shefton 1954, 301).
